description: The bowl-shaped monument in the German capital is designed to move when enough people gather.
title: Berlin monument to 1989 democracy heroes - in pictures
title_page: Berlin monument to 1989 democracy heroes - in pictures - BBC News
maintext: A groundbreaking ceremony has just taken place for the Monument to Freedom and Unity, in central Berlin. The 50m-long (164ft) bowl will move gently up and down when enough people stand on it, and it should be completed by the end of next year.
